skill.author: DCjanus

security_audit.summary: Completely safe skill containing only CSV data files and a BM25 search engine implementation. No network calls, no file system access beyond its own directory, no environment variable access, and no external command execution. The skill provides legitimate UI/UX design guidelines and best practices.

content.user_title: Design professional UIs with comprehensive guidelines
content.value_statement: Stop guessing UI design decisions. Access 50+ curated styles, color palettes, font pairings, and tech-specific best practices. Get data-driven recommendations for any product type or industry.
actual_capabilities: Search 50+ UI styles with implementation details
Get color palettes for 96 product types
Find font pairings with Google Fonts integration
Access tech stack specific guidelines (8 frameworks)
Retrieve UX best practices and anti-patterns
limitations: Requires Python execution for search functionality
Data is static CSV files (no real-time updates)
Search results limited to 3 by default

use_cases.title: Build consistent UIs faster
use_cases.description: Get instant recommendations for colors, fonts, and styles based on your product type and industry.

use_cases.title: Access curated design intelligence
use_cases.description: Search through professionally vetted design patterns, accessibility guidelines, and conversion optimization tips.

use_cases.title: Implement design systems
use_cases.description: Apply framework-specific best practices for React, Vue, Next.js, and other popular tech stacks.

prompt_templates.title: Basic design query
prompt_templates.scenario: Need color palette for SaaS dashboard
prompt_templates.prompt: Search for SaaS dashboard color palette and typography recommendations

prompt_templates.title: Style exploration
prompt_templates.prompt: Find glassmorphism style guide with CSS properties and accessibility considerations

prompt_templates.title: Tech stack specific
prompt_templates.prompt: Search Next.js best practices for responsive design and performance optimization

prompt_templates.title: Comprehensive design
prompt_templates.prompt: Find healthcare app UI recommendations including colors, accessibility, and UX patterns

output: Notes: High contrast for data visibility, professional appearance

best_practices: Search multiple domains (product + style + color) for complete design guidance
Always check UX guidelines for accessibility and performance recommendations
Use stack-specific searches for framework-appropriate implementations
anti_patterns: Don't rely on single search results - cross-reference multiple domains
Avoid using emoji as icons - use proper SVG icons as recommended
Don't skip accessibility guidelines - they're crucial for professional UIs

faq.question: Which domains should I search first?
faq.answer: Start with 'product' for your app type, then 'style', 'color', and 'typography' for visual design.

faq.question: Can I use this for mobile apps?
faq.answer: Yes, search includes mobile-specific guidelines for React Native, SwiftUI, and Flutter stacks.

faq.question: How do I get implementation code?
faq.answer: Use stack-specific searches (html-tailwind, react, nextjs) to get actual code examples and best practices.

faq.question: Is the data updated regularly?
faq.answer: The CSV data files are static. Check the repository for updates or submit improvements via GitHub.

faq.question: What if search returns no results?
faq.answer: Try different keywords or broader terms. The system uses BM25 matching and requires overlapping terms.

faq.question: Can I contribute new design patterns?
faq.answer: Yes, the CSV files are open source. Submit PRs to add new styles, colors, or guidelines.
